alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 9:38PM MST until January 30 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, locally up to 12 inches. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains South of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
